content:
Hi
I submitted a PRE-rfc to IRLO https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/pre-rfc-deprecating-unwindsafe/15974
My apologies if this is the wrong place to mention it
This seems more like a #t-libs thing, though stefahn's proposal might involve #t-lang and #t-compiler.

To explain, your proposal is just a change to the standard library (T-libs). The other proposal is a change the the standard library (T-libs), and adds a lint (T-lang), and sounds like the sort of thing that may be complicated to implement at the compiler level (T-compiler).
